description: Object model for HTML5 canvas, and SVG-to-canvas parser. Backed by jsdom and node-canvas.

name: fabric

scripts.all: npm run build && npm run test && npm run lint && npm run lint_tests && npm run export_dist_to_site && npm run export_tests_to_site
scripts.build:fast: node build.js modules=ALL requirejs fast exclude=gestures,accessors
scripts.build_export: npm run build:fast && npm run export_dist_to_site
scripts.export_dist_to_site: cp dist/fabric.js ../fabricjs.com/lib/fabric.js && cp package.json ../fabricjs.com/lib/package.json && cp -r src HEADER.js lib ../fabricjs.com/build/files/
scripts.export_tests_to_site: cp test/unit/*.js ../fabricjs.com/test/unit && cp -r test/visual/* ../fabricjs.com/test/visual && cp -r test/fixtures/* ../fabricjs.com/test/fixtures
scripts.test:all: npm run test && npm run test:visual
